So far, graduate education at Nankai University boasts a history of more than 80 years. As a comprehensive research university with equal emphasis on liberal arts and science as well as a wide range of disciplines, Nankai University has formed a unique graduate education model.Nankai University currently has 26 colleges (departments, institutes) and research centers with graduate enrollment qualifications, c2021 Admission Guidebook for International Applicants (Master and Doctor)2021 Nankai University Application for International Students(Master and Doctors)Time: December 2, 2020Page view: 1731. Eligibility Applicants must be healthy, non-Chinese citizens and foreign passport holders,with corresponding degree and language proficiency, but withno criminal record in China.(1) Master’s degree applicants must have a bachelor’s degree of Chinese college or an equivalent degree;(2) Doctoral degree applicants must have a master’s degree of Chinese college or an equivalent Let’s get to know the Lecturer Group of Nankai UniversityWhat is the Lecturer Group?The PhD Lecturer Group of Nankai University (hereinafter referred to as the Lecturer Group) was established in May 2012. It is an academic student group mainly composed of doctoral students in Nankai University. The Lecturer Group takes the purpose of studying for doctor’s degree in Nankai University, learning from the real world; upholding the ambition of dedication to public interests and acquisition of all-round capability and promoting youthful spirit, and gives fu38 Tongyan Road, Jinnan District, Tianjin, P.R.China 300350 94 Weijin Road, Nankai District, Tianjin, P.R.China 300071Copyright: Nankai University All Rights ReservedContact usAbout NKUWho We AreHistoryLeadershipAdministrationFacts&FiguresAdmissionDegree EducationNon-Degree EducationEnglish-taught ProgramsExchange ProgramsSummer ProgramsContinuing EducationAcademicsUndergraduate programsGraduate programsColleges and SchoolsResearch InstituesScholarshipResearchLeading ResearchFacultyPublicationsReasearch UnitsGlobalGlobal StrategyPartnersGlobal ResearchSino-foreign Cooperation EducationStudent Exchange ProgramsConfucius InstituesInternational OrgnizationsCampus LifeThings to doVisit NKUResources and ServicesX  Graduate programsGraduate programsLibraryMapsContactLanguageMENUAbout NKUWho We AreHistoryLeadershipAdministrationFacts&FiguresAdmissionDegree EducationNon-Degree EducationEnglish-taught ProgramsExchange ProgramsSummer ProgramsContinuing EducationAcademicsUndergraduate programsGraduate programsColleges and SchoolsResearch InstituesScholarshipResearchLeading ResearchFacultyPublicationsReasearch UnitsGlobalGlobal StrategyPartnersGlobal ResearchSino-foreign Cooperation Educa...Student Exchange ProgramsConfucius InstituesInternational OrgnizationsCampus LifeThings to doVisit NKUResources and ServicesAcademicshomepage  Academics  Graduate programsUndergraduate programsGraduate programsColleges and SchoolsResearch InstituesScholarshipGraduate programsGraduate AcademicsFounded in 1919, the graduate education in Nankai University can be traced back to 1928. graduate education in Nankai University can be traced back to 1928. So far, graduate education at Nankai University boasts a history of more than 80 years. As a comprehensive research university with equal emphasis on liberal arts and science as well as a wide range of disciplines, Nankai University has formed a unique graduate education model.Nankai University currently has 26 colleges (departments, institutes) and research centers with graduate enrollment qualifications, c2021 Admission Guidebook for International Applicants (Master and Doctor)2021 Nankai University Application for International Students(Master and Doctors)Time: December 2, 2020Page view: 1731. Eligibility Applicants must be healthy, non-Chinese citizens and foreign passport holders,with corresponding degree and language proficiency, but withno criminal record in China.(1) Master’s degree applicants must have a bachelor’s degree of Chinese college or an equivalent degree;(2) Doctoral degree applicants must have a master’s degree of Chinese college or an equivalent Let’s get to know the Lecturer Group of Nankai UniversityWhat is the Lecturer Group?The PhD Lecturer Group of Nankai University (hereinafter referred to as the Lecturer Group) was established in May 2012. It is an academic student group mainly composed of doctoral students in Nankai University. The Lecturer Group takes the purpose of studying for doctor’s degree in Nankai University, learning from the real world; upholding the ambition of dedication to public interests and acquisition of all-round capability and promoting youthful spirit, and gives fuGraduate programsGraduate AcademicsFounded in 1919, the graduate education in Nankai University can be traced back to 1928.
